thread.title: Freddie Gray's mom attempts suicide: report
thread.title_full: Freddie Gray's mom attempts suicide: report - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Freddie Gray's mom attempts suicide: report
text:
LUCAS JACKSON/Reuters Gloria Darden sustained superficial wounds and was undergoing a psychiatric evaluation after the suicide attempt, TV station WJZ said. The mother of Freddie Gray, whose death in police custody sparked unrest in Baltimore, tried to commit suicide Wednesday night, according to a report.
Jamiea Speller Freddie Gray, 25, was arrested April 12, and was injured while forced to ride without a seatbelt in a police van. He died a week later. Gloria Darden sustained superficial wounds and was undergoing a psychiatric evaluation after the suicide attempt, according to CBS affiliate WJZ .
Her son, 25, was arrested April 12, and was injured while forced to ride without a seatbelt in a police van. He died a week later, triggering unrest in the city.
Grayâ€™s family got a $6.4 million settlement.
